title: Vasili Penyasov
text:
Vasili Nikolayevich Penyasov (; born 27 July 1987) is a former <a href="Russia">Russia</a>n professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player. 
Club career.
He played in the <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> for <a href="FC%20Sodovik%20Sterlitamak">FC Sodovik Sterlitamak</a> in 2007.
